snippet: A woman in Tennessee will be allowed to name her 8-month-old son Messiah, a judge ruled, overturning an order from another judge who said the name should be changed.
abstract: Tennessee judge rules that Jaleesa Martin will be allowed to name her 8-month-old son Messiah, overturning an order from another judge who said the name could not be used because it belonged to Jesus Christ.
lead_paragraph: A woman in Tennessee will be allowed to name her 8-month-old son Messiah, a judge ruled, overturning an order from another judge who said the name should be changed.

headline.main: Tennessee: Woman Allowed to Name Son Messiah
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Woman Allowed To Name Son Messiah
